name: Dam Together
description:
Two beavers is better than one.  Get your DAM team together and clog up the river! Use your combined strengths and wits to build a masterpiece. Hurry up, you only have 100 seconds until winter. You win when the fast flowing white-water no longer reaches the end of the river.

This game is a submission to Brackeys game jam 2021.1.

This game was created by:

  • Philip : Code & Game Design
  • Natasha : Art & Game Design
